title: Ticket #440: Make a DAGMan cycle detection test
description: Two things: 1. Turn on cycle detection in a number of existing tests. 2. Create a new test with a DAG that has a cycle, run it with cycle detection on, and make sure that the cycle is found.

This is done -- see job_dagman_cycle-A test...

2014-Mar-19 13:18:18 by wenger:
Ah, no, job_dagman_cycle-A isn't exactly what this ticket asks for because it runs the DAG and relies on hitting the cycle while the DAG is running rather thn exercising the actual cycle detection code.
